Translations.Text: Wo bu zicheng qingbai, chu wo de zhu suo ci min zhe wai, renxing que shi yinqi zui'e de. Wo de zhu que shi zui kuanshu de, te ci de.”
Guowang shuo:“Nimen dai ta lai jian wo, wo yao rang ta zhuanmen fushi wo.” Dang ta [you su fu] yu guowang shuohua shi, ta [guowang] shuo:“Jintian, ni zai women zheli que shi gaogui de, ke xinren de.”
Ta [you su fu] shuo:“Qing ni renming wo guanli guoku, wo dique shi yi wei shulian de guanli ren [na shi a qi zi yi shishi, you su fu jieti a qi zi ren aiji de caizheng dachen].”
Wo ruci shi you su fu zai guonei huode quanli: Ta you quan renyi zhipei. Wo ba wo de enhui ciyu wo suo yiyu zhe, wo jue bu shi xingshan zhe de baochou tulao.
Dui xinyang bing jingwei de renmen, houshi de baochou cai shi zui hao de.
You su fu di gegemen laile, tamen jinqu jian ta. Ta ren chule tamen, er tamen ze meiyou ren chu ta.

Dang ta ba tamen suo xu de liangshi tigong ji tamen shi, ta [dui tamen] shuo:“[Xia ci] nimen ba nimen tong fu de didi [ban ya ming] dai lai jian wo! Nandao nimen meiyou kanjian wo gei zule [nimen] suo xu de liangshi, wo shi zui hao de haoke zhe ma?
[Xia ci] jiaru nimen bu dai ta lai jian wo, name, nimen jiang buneng cong wo zheli zai mai dao renhe liangshi, ye buneng jiejin wo.”
Tamen shuo:“Women jiang shefa shuofu ta de fuqin, women yiding zhaoban.”

Ta [you su fu] dui ta de shicongmen shuo:“Nimen ba tamen [mai liang yong] de qiancai fang jin tamen de liang dai li, yibian tamen huiqu jian dao jiaren shi neng ren chu naxie qiancai [you su fu ba tamen mai liang yong de qiancai tui geile tamen], yibian tamen zai huilai.”

Dang tamen huiqu jian dao tamen de fuqin shi, tamen shuo:“Women de fuqin a! Women yi bei jinzhi zai mai liangshile, qing ni pai women de didi tong women yiqi qu ba! Zheyang women jiu neng zai mai dao liangshile, women yiding hen hao baohu ta.”
